component.name: caQtDM
component.summary: caQtDM is a popular Epics framework for developing panels

description.p: caQtDM offers a collection of special widgets in order to display and control control system data in various ways. The widgets have been inspired from the well known MEDM package used at many EPICS sites. However caQtDM is not restricted to EPICS and can/could also support other control systems. At PSI caQtDM is used at several facilities and controls not only EPICS, but also simultaneously an older house-made system. Moreover support has already been introduced for EPICS4, but is still in development.
